languages.text: У скелета в истлевшей робе техножреца иссечены кости правой ноги. По-видимому, это случилось при жизни, и до этой точки он полз, а не шел.

The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.
languages.original_text: У скелета в истлевшей робе техножреца иссечены кости правой ноги. По-видимому, это случилось при жизни, и до этой точки он полз, а не шел.

traits.locale_text: The bones in the right leg of this skeleton dressed in decayed Tech-Priest robes were cleaved. It seems they were still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

The bones in the right leg of this skeleton dressed in decayed Tech-Priest robes were cleaved. It seems they were still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

languages.text: 这具白骨身穿已经腐烂的技术神甫外袍，右腿不翼而飞。从骨头的残余部分来看，那条腿是被砍掉了。看来事发的时候这个人还活着，而且这个人并不是走到了这里，而是爬到了这里。
languages.original_text: The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

traits.locale_text: 这具白骨身穿已经腐烂的技术祭司外袍，右腿不翼而飞。从骨头的残余部分来看，那条腿是被砍掉了。看来事发的时候这个人还活着，而且这个人并不是走到了这里，而是爬到了这里。

languages.text: Al esqueleto ataviado con ropajes de tecnosacerdote descompuestos le falta la pierna derecha. A juzgar por los restos de los huesos, le fue amputada. Parece que la persona estaba viva cuando sucedió y que se arrastró aquí en vez de caminar.
languages.original_text: The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

traits.locale_text: Al esqueleto ataviado con ropajes de tecnosacerdote descompuestos le falta la pierna derecha. A juzgar por los restos de los huesos, le fue amputada. Parece que la persona estaba viva cuando sucedió y que se arrastró aquí en vez de caminar.

languages.text: 朽ちた技術司祭のローブをまとった骸骨は右足を失っている。残った骨から判断すると、足は切り落とされたらしい。その時点でこの人物はまだ生きており、歩くのではなく這ってこの場所までたどり着いたようだ。
languages.original_text: The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

traits.locale_text: 朽ちた技術司祭のローブをまとった骸骨は右足を失っている。残った骨から判断すると、足は切り落とされたらしい。その時点でこの人物はまだ生きており、歩くのではなく這ってこの場所までたどり着いたようだ。

languages.text: Dem Skelett in verrotteter Techpriester-Robe fehlt das rechte Bein. Den Überresten der Knochen nach zu urteilen, wurde es wohl abgehackt. Anscheinend war die Person zu dem Zeitpunkt noch am Leben und erreichte diese Stelle kriechend und nicht gehend.
languages.original_text: The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

traits.locale_text: Dem Skelett in verrotteter Techpriester-Robe fehlt das rechte Bein. Den Überresten der Knochen nach zu urteilen, wurde es wohl abgehackt. Anscheinend war die Person zu dem Zeitpunkt noch am Leben und erreichte diese Stelle kriechend und nicht gehend.

languages.text: Le squelette, vêtu d'une robe de technoprêtre délabrée, n'a plus de jambe droite. À en juger par le reste du corps, la jambe a été sectionnée. La victime était encore en vie lorsque cela s'est produit. Elle est ensuite arrivée jusqu'ici en rampant plutôt qu'en marchant.
languages.original_text: The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.

traits.locale_text: Le squelette, vêtu d'une robe de technoprêtre délabrée, n'a plus de jambe droite. À en juger par le reste du corps, la jambe a été sectionnée. La victime était encore en vie lorsque cela s'est produit. Elle est ensuite arrivée jusqu'ici en rampant plutôt qu'en marchant.

languages.text: Yıpranmış bir Tekno Rahip cübbesi giyen iskeletin sağ bacağı yerinde değil. Kemik kalıntılarının hâline bakılacak olursa bacağı kesilerek ayrılmış. Anlaşılan bacağı kesilirken bu kişi hâlâ hayattaymış ve buraya yürümektense sürünerek gelmiş.
languages.original_text: The skeleton in decayed Tech-Priest robes is missing its right leg. Judging by what remains of the bones, the leg was hacked off. It seems the person was still alive when it happened, and they reached this spot by crawling rather than walking.
